scenario_text.value: Grrraaaaaawwwrrr!

Argh... He may be weaker than he was before,
but he’s still really strong!

(We just got that surge of power, and Miyuki
is still singing. What more can we do?!)
Huh? What’s that light?
Finally...you found me.
The light is...being drawn into Miyuki?
Aah...Aahhh... AAAAAAHHHHHH!!!
Miyuki!!! What’s going on?!
Miyuki looks...different?!
Haruchika...

At last we are together, my dear little
brother...

Is that...Haruchika’s sister Yukiha?! Has her
spirit taken over Miyuki?!
Now you come?! Noooooowww?!

Look! It’s like there’s some sort of black
mist coming out of the Master’s body...

Oh... How awful... It is this aura of malice
that drives you to such a terrible state.

Hear me, countless souls of rage and hate,
who perished in the warring world!
I shall take your dark malice upon myself!
Takuma! Look at Fanglongmon!
Yes... His power is being...suppressed?

Now please, help Haruchika... Help my
brother...
I beg of you, all of you. Save him...
Please!
